entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
